name: Phase Shift (itch) (Alpy261)
description:
This is my first game. It was inspired by something I made in Garry's Mod in 2020. Parts of the map are inspired by Cubic_Llama's districtsnowy_final in the Garry's Mod workshop. 

This Game Has Extremely Good Graphics and Anyone With Medical History of Being Amazed Should Avoid This Game!

Controls:

E: Pick Up object

Hold Alt + E: Interact

Left Mouse: Shoot

R: Reload

WASD for movement

Ctrl: crouch

Space: Jump

Shift: Run

I wish you the best of luck trying to figure out how to use the items in the game

Things I know About:

Sentry doesn't exist

Retry and Quit at the end of the game cannot be accessed

no main menu or way of quitting except Alt + f4

no way to view controls except this page

I KNOW THE FP45 ISNT SEMI AUTOMATIC SHUSH

Yeah good luck buddy

Cover Art From: Forgotten Weapons
